summary: Sentra Guest OS (SGO) hotel booking app: align guest/hotel currency display, fix hotel-side booking history after confirmations, add guest review/rating, and update footer branding. User also requests re-trying publish/build due to deploy/build failures.
known_issues: Build/deploy/publish is intermittently failing (app generation/build did not complete); user requests retry and asks how to publish

existing_features.title: Add an in-app “Publishing & Deployment” help section that explains (in English) how to publish the app and what to do if a deploy/build fails, including a clear instruction that if deployment fails the user should rerun deployment, and a checklist for what to try when changes are not visible after a successful deploy (hard refresh, reset app cache, disable offline cache/service worker). Place this section on the Account Status page so it is easy to find.

Extend the existing Pre-Publish Gate UI to include a small “Post-deploy verification” subsection (English) with 3–5 checkboxes focused on confirming the new version is actually live (e.g., verify footer/version-visible change, reload without stale cache, confirm key routes load). Include a short note that if verification fails due to stale assets, use the Troubleshooting tools to clear caches and then retry verification.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show room prices in guest account using Rupiah (IDR), consistent with hotel account
Fix hotel booking history: confirmed guest bookings should remain visible in hotel account for reconciliation on arrival
Enable guest users to submit reviews and ratings for hotels
Update footer text to "Built by Sentra Guest OS (SGO)"
